model.scene1_body: My name is Ramu. One day, we went to a Dasara fair
model.scene2_body: Papa bought Chintu fancy glasses. Mother bought me a bright blue cap. The baby got sugar candy.
model.scene3_body: On the way home, a very strong wind came. It blew my cap away.
model.scene4_body: My cap got stuck on a branch of the old Pipal tree.
model.scene5_body: I cried a lot. And I did not eat my dinner.
model.scene6_body: Later that night, the moon came up. It looked at my cap on the old Pipal tree.
model.scene7_body: It tried on my cap. The moon smiled happily. I smiled too.
model.scene8_body: After school the next day, my mother gave me a shiny new red cap."The moon sent it," she said.
model.scene9_body: That night, both the moon and I wore our caps and smiled. We were happy.
model.scene10_body: Do you think the sun needs a hat?.
model.findInPicture: Find the Following things in picture
